Package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.filelistener

Class DirectoryTreeWatcher

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.filelistener.DirectoryWatcher
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.filelistener.DirectoryTreeWatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class DirectoryTreeWatcher extends DirectoryWatcher
DirectoryTreeWatcher uses the Java WatchService capabilities to support the ability for an Integration Connector to monitor changes in the file system.
